website_summaries.verdict: Non-drying formula comes in one universal color for a perfect finish to all makeup looks.
pros: One universal color so you don't have to worry about finding the right color
Very lightweight and won't create any buildup or residue
Comes with a high quality velour puff applicator
cons: Needs to be blended carefully or else if can leave a white residue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had read that this and Laura Mercier's tinted moisturizer was all that L'Wren Scott used for her daily makeup as far as her foundation went. I bought both and tried them out together. Now I'm sorry that I bought this powder. No matter if I use too little, just right or too much, it makes me look old, wrinkled, and corpse-like. My friend agreed, asking why I looked like "a morgue." I have normal skin, combination skin. Maybe it's just my chemistry. But I'm never going to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Present

customer_reviews.title: Not Universal!!
customer_reviews.text: THis powder is NOT universal!!! Your face will end up looking like a kabuki artist! This powder emphasizes every dry spot on your face and it makes you look sickly pale. I’m returning this immediately! Very very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Setting powder worth the extra step
customer_reviews.text: I don't spend a lot of time on makeup, but as an older (mid-50's) woman in a professional work setting, I want to look good. I use Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer as a base, and a little bronzing powder and blush, then brush on this setting powder. It gives a noticeably smooth and even appearance to my complexion, and reduces shine. The result looks more like a professional makeup job than a quick casual application.
customer_reviews.author: mnop

product_meta.title: Laura Mercier Invisible Loose Setting Powder
product_meta.description:
Ultra-light, talc-free loose powder is made with micro-refined silica for an incredibly soft, silky feel. Floats weightlessly onto skin to set and smooth your look. Gives skin a natural, shine-free finish. Invisible shade is colourless and works on all skin tones. Like all Laura Mercier setting powders, it has a soft-focus effect that subtly blurs the look of fine lines and imperfections. Sets makeup so it doesn't settle into fine lines or pores. Oil-free. Talc-free. Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.

THE STORY OF LAURA MERCIER
Laura Mercier is a world-renowned makeup artist and creator of such cosmetic products as Laura Mercier Makeup, Laura Mercier Skin Care, and Laura Mercier Fragrances.
feature_bullets: This loose, talc-free powder is made with micro-refined silica for an incredibly soft, silky feel
It floats weightlessly onto skin to set and smooth your look and gives skin a natural, shine-free finish
Leaves you a luminous and natural complexion
